name: Chicken Biryani Sri Lankan Style
description: Fragrant rice layered with spiced chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, ginger-garlic, garam masala
Cover and cook on low heat (dum)
cultural_notes: Popular at Muslim weddings and celebrations
description_sinhala: කුළුබඩු සහිත කුකුල් මස් තට්ටුවක් සහිත සුවඳ සහල්
description_tamil: மசாலா கோழியுடன் அடுக்கப்பட்ட மணம் கொண்ட அரிசி
cultural_notes_sinhala: මුස්ලිම් විවාහ උත්සව සහ උත්සවවලදී ජනප්‍රියයි
